page.title: 01Family Life.Rotherham.
page.content: Most peoples mum and dad work during the week mainly in the town. It is common in familys that the men go to work in the car and the women go to work on the bus. A few people have moved to Kimberworth because they had wanted a bigger house. Most people get up at 7:15am to go to school or to go to work. On Saturday and Sunday people relax and do there hobbies. Some children who go to our school (Old Hall Comprehensive) go horse riding at Barley Hall Riding School at Thorpe Hesley. Some people have dogs,cats or fish to keep as pets.
